shri lanka nidahas pakshaye 59 wani sanwathsaraya labana 2da perawaru 9.00ta araliyagaha mandirayedi shri lanka nidahas pakshaye sabhapathi mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen pawathwe.me sanwathsara samuluwata kabinat mathi amathiwaru palath sabha mathi amathiwaru aandukarawaru da athulu rata pura wisiri sitimin pakshaye katayuthuwala apakapawi kriyakarana kriyakarin da anubaddhitha shakha samithiwala samajika samajikawoda athulu dasadahasakata adhika pirisak sahabhagiwimata niyamithaya.mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma da pakshaye lekam amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha da mehidi katha kirimata niyamithaya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
